Name: the Ryan's Rebels
ReputationStatements: You want to get paid, don't you? Take this job, and we all end up with more money. You've got nothing to lose.
Mercenary, we have a job for you and money to waste. Do this, and you will be compensated above your station.
Welcome, mercenary. We have another job that requires attention—take it and don't dare fail us now.
Still hungry for money, I see? We have something that needs to be shot up.
We've got a nice raid planned and need something gone—do this, and we'll share in the riches.
Ahh, you're back for more? We always have someone to kill and places to plunder. Will you join us?
Welcome, friend! Join us on this raid and share in the booty.
MissionSuccessStatements: Well done, mercenary. You are almost worth the money we spent on you.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: At least you got the job done. Learn from this before we have to kill you ourselves.
BadFaithFailureStatements: You dare to fail us? Begone, before I kill you myself!
